text: Please click on one of the answer options
If you decide to go to the Corona ambulance of Charité, please show the following QR code, which will speed up your registration:

Currently, you don't need to do anything, since:

- you didn't have contact to a verified case
- you haven't been in a risk region with frequent SARS-COV2 cases
- and you don't have symptoms.
Please carefully take hand hygiene into consideration.

If you develop symptoms of a cold in the next couple of days, please contact the hotline of the Senate Department for Health (Tel. 030/9028 28 28) or one of the Coronavirus ambulances.

Please stay at home and avoid unneccessary contact to other persons.
Please contact your local health department or call the hotline of the Senate Department for Health (Tel. 030/9028 28 28) for further steps.
Please avoid contact to other people and stay at home, if possible.
If you need to leave home: Please keep a distance of at least 2 meters to other persons, do not touch anything and try to correctly cough and sneeze without affecting persons.
If you develop symptoms of a cold in the next couple of days, please contact the hotline of the Senate Department for Health (Tel. 030/9028 28 28) or one of the ambulances.

You are showing symptoms which are not specific to a Coronavirus infection. Please stay at home, cure yourself and avoid unneccessary contcats to other persons.
If you developing further symptoms like problems breathing, cough or fever in the next couple of days, please contact your general practitioner or one of the ambulances.
If you need to leave home: Please keep a distance of at least 2 meters to other persons, do not touch anything and try to correctly cough and sneeze without affecting persons.
If you feel unsure, talk with your general practitioner or please contact the hotline of the Senate Department for Health (Tel. 030/9028 28 28).

Please contact your general practitioner or one of the following ambulances:

Coronavirus-Ambulanz im Gemeinschaftskrankenhaus Havelhöhe
Haus 16, Kladower Damm 221, Spandau
030/36501-7222
geöffnet Mo-Fr 9-20 Uhr

Charité-Standort Virchow in Wedding
Mittelallee 1
030/9028 28 28
geöffnet täglich 8 bis 16 Uhr

Vivantes-Klinikum Prenzlauer Berg
Diesterwegstraße
030/9028 28 28
Mo-Fr 10- 19 Uhr, Sa/So 10-17 Uhr

Vivantes Wenckebach-Klinikum in Tempelhof
Albrechtstraße
030/9028 28 28
Mo-Fr 10- 19 Uhr, Sa/So 10-17 Uhr

Evangelisches Krankenhaus Königin Elisabeth Herzberge in Lichtenberg
Herzbergstraße 79, 10365 Berlin
030/9028 28 28
Mo-Fr: 10-19 Uhr, Sa/So 10-17 Uhr

Please save the following QR Code and the summary of your answers. If possible, please print the summary and show it in the ambulance.
If you need to leave home: Please keep a distance of at least 2 meters to other persons, do not touch anything and try to correctly cough and sneeze without affecting persons.
